label: Tweet containing date in the format mmm d (e.g. Jan 6)

tweet.text: There's been this weird sense among Democrats since Jan. 6 that the Capitol insurrection was Trump's big plan, and that we should focus on making sure everyone knows how bad Jan. 6 is, but in that rush we've kind of raced past a lot of evidence that Jan. 6 WASN'T Trump's big plan
